subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] TAPSCON Clearwater Florida
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Nope not makin that one I'm working all weekend. I checked the roster about a month ago and looked interesting if you are a fan of some of the TAPS members who are attending or one of the other guests.

You live close? I'm not that far from there maybe an hour if I get lost(or 2 lookin for a place to park LOL)

Feeds might be cool depending on what information they are sharing with the public. I may check in to see if they got them up later.

Misty


--- On Sat, 7/19/08, kolrone <a.cronk@...> wrote:

> From: kolrone <a.cronk@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] TAPSCON Clearwater Florida
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Saturday, July 19, 2008, 9:42 AM
> I tried sending this yesterday (Friday), but I guess it
> didn't go through. "I know how some people feel
> about the TAPS guys, but is anyone going to TAPSCON (
> http://tapscon.com/ ) in Clearwater, Florida this
> weekend? I can't make it on Saturday, since I have to
> work, but I'm thinking about going on Sunday. If you go
> to the site it has a live feed (which I plan to watch at
> work) and its venue, etc. There's going to be all
> kinds of different stuff, but I don't know if it's
> worth the money. I think it'd be interesting to go
> though."
>   
> -Aaron
